name: places/ChIJvT8y8V8Z2jERMp-HfDjJQZw/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNvdzdDNHJRRRAB
text:
{'text': "Must do for your next cocktail night!

Love the Indian twist on the drinks, it's a truly unique combination of western liquors and eastern flavours.

Caught their Happy Hour and ordered the Espresso Martini and Milk Punch. Espresso Martini was true to the classic, and Milk Punch had some kick to it.

The team have built a great atmosphere, special thanks to Mugi and Han.

The signature cocktails looked super interesting, need to save something for next time though!", 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText:

The team have built a great atmosphere, special thanks to Mugi and Han.

The signature cocktails looked super interesting, need to save something for next time though!", 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJvT8y8V8Z2jERMp-HfDjJQZw/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNJcDVlVDd3RRAB
text:
{'text': 'Now nestled in its new home at Keong Saik, this intimate, cozy space exudes charm and character. The bar is the brainchild and passion project of Yugnes (affectionately known as Yugi), and his team brings the soul of India to life—both in the glass and on the plate. The passion and attention to detail here are undeniable.

The Elephant Room celebrates the spirit of the Indian subcontinent with creativity and flair. Every cocktail is a conversation starter, crafted with handpicked Indian ingredients that tell a story. Take the “Jyoti Flower Shop,” for instance—a tribute to a legendary temple florist—or the unforgettable “Briyani” cocktail, inspired by India’s beloved staple dish. With hints of ghee sake and basmati makgeolli, this drink shouldn’t work… but it absolutely does. It’s bold, layered, and unexpectedly comforting—just like the dish itself. The ghee lends a velvety mouthfeel, perfectly balanced by the subtle nuttiness of the basmati.

Don’t miss the “Champagne Fizz,” “Wild & Fresh,” or the mysteriously named “Missing Since 1984.” Each one holds its own. We rated most drinks a solid 4/5—and the food? Spot on.

Lovely drinks, great food, chill music, and a warm, polite crew—it all adds up to a near-perfect night out. No wonder this spot earned its place among Asia’s 50 Best Bars, ranking at #65.

Believe the buzz. The Elephant Room isn’t just a bar—it’s an experience. ⭐️⭐️', 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText:

With hints of ghee sake and basmati makgeolli, this drink shouldn’t work… but it absolutely does. It’s bold, layered, and unexpectedly comforting—just like the dish itself. The ghee lends a velvety mouthfeel, perfectly balanced by the subtle nuttiness of the basmati.

name: places/ChIJvT8y8V8Z2jERMp-HfDjJQZw/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURvdEk3ZTZnRRAB
text: {'text': 'Cocktails and food with Indian influence. Lots of herb and spice infusions and garnishes. I love how their cocktail menu is descriptive enough to make ordering easy.  I had 2 cocktails with the refreshing/balanced flavour profile and enjoyed both.\nFood was interesting. We had the okra fries and pappadam with eggplant curry dip. Though not mind blowing, they were a nice alternatives to the usual bar snacks.\nService was polite and friendly, setting was nice but a bit cramped. Especially when they squeeze seats in the passageway.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJvT8y8V8Z2jERMp-HfDjJQZw/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUN2OTRUZFpREAE
text:
{'text': 'The BEST(!)(?)
Well this might be. Listen, the cocktails are savory and delightful. Chicken curry and crab are exceptions to my cocktail world. Service is wonderful. Haven’t felt this welcomed in a bar in a while.

But, my friends - the Indian Fried Chicken Burger Sandwich……… the GREATEST chicken sandwich of ALL TIME. Double Chicken Please in NYC does not match this. All restaurants better be scared of this place. Elephant room serves the best chicken sandwich on the planet. I wish I would try other dishes, but I’ve formed an addiction.
Will be returning for my 4th chicken sandwich in a row tomorrow night. It just feels like a treat to have some great people and cocktails to accompany such a life memory. Thank you', 'languageCode': 'en'}
